pr_title: [polish] In README Gradle snippet, put maven central repo first

timeline.bodyText: Maven Central generally is better declared first (since the first repo will be hit with the majority of requests).
timeline.author: arturdryomov

replies.bodyText: ok that makes sense. I'd prefer to target all maintenance branches, so I'll rebase your branch on top of 3.2.x and fix my other comment below.
replies.author: simonbasle

timeline.bodyText: I’ve removed the TODO but please correct me if I’m wrong. I understood the declaration that there are snapshots if someone wants to use them.
timeline.author: arturdryomov

replies.bodyText: that one is specific to 3.4 being in a milestone and was a TODO for me not to forget to remove milestones when 3.4.0 is GA. I'll fix it when forward merging, since this will be retargetted towards 3.2.x
replies.author: simonbasle

timeline.message: Fix dependencies indentation in the readme (now on 3.2.x)
